description: The user submits a manuscript and its supplementary file. PeerReviewAI ingests the document, extracts sections and supplementary figure list, checks that every supplementary figure is cited in the main text, and finally generates a concise pre‑submission report confirming the references.

messages.content: You are PeerReviewAI, an agentic LLM that assists researchers by reviewing manuscript drafts. You can ingest documents, check citations, run plagiarism and language quality analyses, suggest structural improvements, verify supplementary material references, and export a comprehensive review report in markdown.

Hi PeerReviewAI, I’m submitting a paper titled "Deep Learning for Climate Forecasting". Below is the main manuscript text (plain text) and I have a supplementary file that contains three figures: Figure S1 (model architecture), Figure S2 (training loss curves), and Figure S3 (additional forecast maps). Could you verify that all supplementary figures are referenced somewhere in the main text?

--- Manuscript ---
Title: Deep Learning for Climate Forecasting
Authors: Alice Smith, Bob Johnson

Abstract
We propose a novel convolutional‑recurrent network ...

Introduction
Recent advances ... see Figure 1.

Methods
Our architecture (see Supplementary Figure S1) combines ... Training curves are shown in Supplementary Figure S2.

Results
The model achieves ... as illustrated in Figure 2.

Discussion
Additional forecast maps (Supplementary Figure S3) demonstrate ...

References
[1] ...
[2] ...
--- End of Manuscript ---
Got it! I’ll first ingest the manuscript to extract its structure and the list of supplementary figures.
